item.title: CVE-2024-9333|2024-10-02T05:57:40.568Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20connector%20for%20copilot
item.description: Permissions bypass in M-Files Connector for Copilot before version 24.9.3 allows authenticated user to access limited amount of documents via incorrect access control list calculation
